name: Umbrel v0.3.10
notes:
Announcing Umbrel v0.3.10 with Taproot ready Bitcoin Core v0.21.1, the new BlueWallet Lightning app in the Umbrel App Store, and Tor connection support for both BlueWallet on iOS and Android.

If you face any difficulties while updating, please message us on Telegram: https://t.me/getumbrel
